title: [Large-Scale] Job Redesign Competency Enhancement Course for Medical Professionals Based on Emergency Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical workflow processes and patient care experience
context.additional_context: Reflecting the need for rapid job adaptation and competency enhancement among medical professionals during the pandemic

learning_goals: Three or more job redesign strategies can be analyzed and applied to restructure medical tasks in emergency situations.
Patient care processes can be improved by 80% or more through collaboration with peer experts via mentoring and job shadowing.
Decision-making accuracy of 90% or higher can be achieved for crisis response scenarios through simulation workshops.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
